page.title: 20Hollins Cottage Homes
page.content:
{Hollins Cottage Homes}were built in l896 by the Bolton Union as an orphanage for 40 boys & 40 girls aged from 5 to 11, mainly the children of people in the nearby Workhouse & Lunatic Asylum. The boys were trained to be tailors & cobblers and the girls were trained for domestic service. They started work when they were 11. In l9l3 more houses were added. The orphanage was closed in the 1950's & is now used as{Emergency Accomodation} {for homeless families.} Zoey Unsworth.
